main.name: Hi, I'm Thomas Bui
main.description: Long-time educator with experience living in both Japan and Vietnam.  Working towards a transition into software development and engineering.
main.bio: Tech enthusiast with a strong background working in education.  8+ years in education, with 5 years spent teaching in Japan.  Hobbyist programmer for many years using python and C++.  Self taught topics in the past year include computer graphics, web development, databases, machine learning and compilers.  Hobbies outside of work and programming include runnning, calisthenics, and learning about nutrition.
